about.paraOne: Hello, Elliot here. Thanks for checking out my website. I will hopefully be updating the site bit by bit over the year.
about.paraTwo: the next few months. In the meantime please checkout some of the blog posts I have made and if you need to contact me then feel free.
about.paraThree: I am a software developer at bet365 where I have been mainly working of the sports/main site on web and mobile using typescript but I am always trying new languages and frameworks in my spare time.
about.paraFour: Also play hockey every week and make music in between.
